title: How to find Various Tech Topics for my Blog posts - Quora

response.answer_text: It's not an easy task to find topics for your Blog, YouTube Channel etc. But here are some few ways and tips to find the Right Topic for your Blog. Google Search Box - It is the most Useful and popular way to find the right topic for your Blog or any other Things. Now , you might be thinking of how can I find Topics through Google. So, you just have to do is head-over to google and type How to , Top 10 tips , Top 10,5 ways , how can I , etc. By searching these things you can easily find many topics. Like thisAnd you can also search your own Words to find other More Topics.  Quora-Search - This is also the most helpful way to find Topics for your Blog posts.Just search Some Keywords like the Before we have searched on Google and pick the topics that you can write on it and that is helpful for your Audience.  Youtube-Search - Juat follow the Same Procedure in it as Discussed Before.And find the Best topic for your Blog posts.  Comments - And now it's a different way to find the topics for your Blog. If you've Huge Audience you definitely have Many Comments on your Blog . So choose the topics from your Comments that you're Audience is Trying to Ask. It's the Best way to Satisfy your Audience Needs. And if you are a Beginner and you don't have a Huge Audience on your Site , then you just have to do is Find the Popular sites of your Niche like if you have a Tech based Site then visit the Popular Tech Sites like Tech crunch , gadgets Now etc And after that just pick the Topics from the Comments that the Audience is Trying to Ask.And the last But not Least just Analyse on your Niche get all all the knowledge of your Niche and after it post and Cover every Topic of it Sequence Wisely. Thanks for Reading And giving Your precious Time.

From what I am able to understand you want to start with writing blogs in technology. And for all the latest topics, you need to be ready with all the latest news. There are websites like mobile phone reviews, news, specifications and more... , Phone Arena - Phone News, Reviews and Specs , where you can go for latest news. And if you like to read all of the tech blogs at one single place then go for storyloop.in, an app where you can find all of the blogs, videos related to technology, share them on your social accounts, and if you have any blogs you can link that too.
